oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: National Life Canteen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Duke of Paducah, 1901-1986; Craig, Francis, 1900-1966; Metal photoplates; Split Fountain Printing;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color half sheet (black and red on split fountain, yellow to blue) announcing the National Life Canteen second season featuring the Duke of Paducah (Whitey Ford), Francis Craig and his orchestra, and an array of stars of radio - stage and screen in person. Poster features metal photoplates of the Duke of Paducah and Francis Craig and his orchestra.
